messages.title: IT'S TIME TO BUILD A BRIGHTER FUTURE
messages.content: For too many people, things aren't working as they should be. Both the Conservatives and Labour are failing time and again to deliver a better future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats' plan for government stands in stark contrast to the dreary offer from the Conservatives or Labour. They want to secure our place in the bloc. They aim to share, heal, and reform the empire of 1970's socialism.

mentions.candidate: Jo Swinson said, 'We have ambitious plans for the future of our country, giving people power, every community and our planet can thrive.'
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Boris Johnson's Conservatives, Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party

issues.brexitEurope: Leading the fight to Stop Brexit.
issues.education: Cut NHS waiting times, tackle the climate emergency, drive up performance in our schools.

leaflet.personalStatement: 'We have ambitious plans for the future of our country, giving people power, every community and our planet can thrive.' - Jo Swinson

contactInformation.address: Freepost RSTK-HKSH-EJGE, Liberal Democrats, 8-10 Great George Street, London, SW1P 3AE

images.caption: A photo of Jo Swinson with the message: 'IT'S TIME TO BUILD A BRIGHTER FUTURE'
Liberal Democrats Winning Here sign with a crowd holding a sign 'Liberal Democrats STOP BREXIT'
